game.name: Ollie and the Merchant of Dreams
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ollie and the Merchant of Dreams is an indie 2D Metroidvania where you traverse a lore-rich world, summon ancient deities to your aid, ride a winged unicorn into battle, and unravel a story of duty and betrayal to free all of creation from chaos.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ollie and the Merchant of Dreams is an indie 2D Metroidvania where you traverse a lore-rich world, summon ancient deities to your aid, ride a winged unicorn into battle, and unravel a story of duty and betrayal to free all of creation from chaos.
